humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: Based on the pathology report, there is metastatic carcinoma in one out of the fifteen lymph nodes assessed (1/15). This corresponds to the N1 stage as per the AJCC staging system (New Rule 12).

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The N stage for cancer staging is determined by the presence and extent of lymph node involvement. In this report, the patient has metastatic carcinoma in one out of 15 lymph nodes (1/15). This corresponds to N1 stage according to the AJCC/UICC staging system.
